title: Orchestral Chamber Strings Staccato Collection
description: Explore our exclusive collection of 10 orchestral tracks featuring a chamber strings ensemble, masterfully performing with staccato articulation. Ideal for game developers seeking high-quality, classical string ensemble sounds.
longDescription:
Immerse yourself in the rich tones of our 'Chamber Strings Staccato Collection', featuring 10 meticulously sampled tracks. Performed by a professionally arranged chamber strings orchestra, our ensemble includes 6 Violins, 4 Violas, 3 Cellos, and 2 Double Basses, all recorded in a classical orchestral hall. This collection is based on staccato articulation only, offering a crisp and dynamic sound signature.


Each track in this collection is a loop-ready version, expertly crafted to ensure seamless integration into your projects. These tracks are rearranged replicas from our popular 'Classical Piano Moods 2' series, designed to complement and enhance these original compositions.


🎧 Preview the collection here: Orchestral Chamber Strings Staccato Collection - YouTube Preview 🎧


For those interested in exploring different string ensemble arrangements, we offer several other packs:


  1. Staccato Solo Strings Ð¡ollection: A delicate ensemble of 2 Violins, 1 Viola, and 1 Cello, all recorded in a classical orchestral hall. Perfect for intimate and nuanced compositions.
  2. Staccato Orchestral Strings: Experience the grandeur with 14 Violins, 10 Violas, 8 Cellos, and 6 Double basses, all captured in a classical setting. Ideal for larger, more complex arrangements.
  3. Staccato Cinematic Strings: Dive into the world of cinematic soundscapes with our largest ensemble of 20 Violins, 14 Violas, 12 Cellos, and 10 Double Basses, recorded in a grand 'Hollywood' style hall. A perfect choice for developers seeking epic string sounds.


This collection is a must-have for game developers looking for high-quality, classical string sounds to elevate their creative projects.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Mixed and mastered specifically for video games.
  • Normalized Loudness
  • Fits perfectly into the gameplay.

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22:45

Supported Development Platforms: All
